Average Elementary Teacher salaries for job postings in Indiana are 4% lower than average Elementary Teacher salaries for job postings nationwide.

The average teacher salary in Indiana was $46,640 in 2009. This was somewhat lower than the national 2009 average of $49,720. In 2008, teacher salaries in Indiana put the state at 25th in the nation. Looking at the teaching salaries in Indiana from 2007, it is clear that Indiana teacher salaries have been steadily behind most of the nation. The 2007 average teacher salary in 2007 was $46,600, which put the state at 23rd in the U.S. Overall, teaching salaries in Indiana have increased by 0.09 percent between 2007 and 2009, which can be seen on the Indiana teacher salary schedule below
